resources.string: OpusReader
Start the reading of your Opus or Occasional card

ARTM (Autorité régionale de transport métropolitain), exo, Opus, REM (Réseau express métropolitain), RTC (Réseau de transport de la Capitale), RTL (Réseau de transport de Longueuil), STM (Société de transport de Montréal), STL (Société de transport de Laval) et STLévis (Société de transport de Lévis) are registered trademarks. This application is not affiliated with, endorsed or sponsored by these entities.
NFC functionality unavailable
It looks like your phone does not have the NFC (near-field communication) functionality required for the application to work.
NFC functionality disabled
The NFC (near-field communication) functionality of your phone has to be enabled for the application to work.

Information about the fare
This fare is currently unknown by the application.
This fare can still be used, but it is not possible to bought it anymore. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses of the STL (Société de Transport de Laval). 

It is provided for free with the Quality Commitment program of the agency. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in this zone. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A and B. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B and C. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. 

This ticket is not valid on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.
This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nOnce used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A and B. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B and C. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of two distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of two distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nOnce a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare consists of two distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of two distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A and B. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of two distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare is provided for free as an attenuation measure during l'Île aux Tourtes bridge construction. It consists of two distinct tickets that have to be used before May 31st, 2024. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare offers a discount of 25% on the standard price as an attenuation measure during l'Île aux Tourtes bridge construction. It consists of ten distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B and C. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare is valid for 24 hours (starting after the first use). It is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for three days in a row (until 11:59 PM on the third day after the first use). It is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for seven days in a row (from Monday until 11:59 PM on Sunday). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for all the evening (from 6 PM until the next day at 5 AM). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. 

This fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers. 

This fare is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare is valid for all the weekend (from Friday at 4 PM until Monday at 5 AM). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare consists of six distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on bus route \'125 - Saint-Donat / Chertsey / Montréal\' from the MRC Joliette. \n\nIt can be used for a trip between Saint-Donat and Montréal (or the other way around) on this route.
